about_the_game:
A Pair Of Feathers Squawk Together is an easy-to-play, challenging-to-beat platformer inspired by the likes of Jump King and Bread & Fred. Flap the Parrot only has two controls: a right flap, to flap to the right, and a left flap, to flap to the left. As you get higher up the island, you'll encounter new regions with new gimmicks and traps to be wary of. Avoid getting sent back to the ocean down below, and find the treasure at the peak!

Singleplayer

Play the game solo and aim for a fast time! Your best time will be saved and displayed, perfect for bragging rights and speedrunning possibilities.

Multiplayer

Play the game with a friend for a co-op challenge! Each player will control one of Flap's two movement options: right flap or left flap. Coordinate your button presses as best you can; just don't blame your friend too hard when they mess up.

Multiplayer can be done locally or using Steam Remote Play. To use Steam Remote Play:
1. Press Shift+Tab to open the Steam Community Overlay
2. Click on the Remote Play Together tab at the bottom of the screen
3. Invite a friend or guest to your session
4. Enable Player 2's keyboard by clicking on the keyboard icon next to their name
5. Done! Both players can now use their keyboards to control the game

The rumored treasure is said to make you rich beyond belief. It's up to you (and possibly a friend!) to prove that the rumor is true!

short_description: Play as Flap the Parrot as you climb an uncharted island with treasure rumored at the top! Play solo or with a friend controlling Flap, avoiding traps sure to send you back to your pirate ship.
